Engineering is a broad field that encompasses various disciplines, each with its own specific areas of study. For instance, thermodynamics is a fundamental subject in mechanical engineering that deals with heat and energy transfer. Fluid mechanics, on the other hand, is crucial in civil and environmental engineering for understanding the behavior of liquids and gases. Circuit theory is a key concept in electrical engineering, focusing on the analysis and design of electrical circuits. Based on this information, which discipline is most likely to focus on circuit theory?
A. Mechanical Engineering
B. Civil Engineering
C. Electrical Engineering
D. Environmental Engineering
